name: send_certificate
doc:
def send_certificate(user_id: str, amount: int) -> str:
    """
Send a certificate to a user. Be careful!

Args:
    user_id: The ID of the user to book the reservation, such as 'sara_doe_496'.
    amount: The amount of the certificate to send.

Returns:
    A message indicating the certificate was sent.

Raises:
    ValueError: If the user is not found.
"""

user_id.description: The ID of the user to book the reservation, such as 'sara_doe_496'.
user_id.title: User Id

amount.description: The amount of the certificate to send.
amount.title: Amount

returns.description: A message indicating the certificate was sent.
returns.title: Returns
